name: SRI SATYA SAI DHARMIKA SEVA SAMSTHA
briefDescription: Sri Satya Sai Dharmika Seva Samstha is a Registered Society which runs a Complete FREE School in the name Sri Satya Sai Samagra Vidya Kendram for the poorest of the poor. We provide FREE Education, Free Evening Nutritious Food & Time to Time Free Medical Checkups. This Academic year 284 children are getting Free Education.
